ygData.subject: Re: E'ci server want to learn languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll extend the invitation on this string as well. I will be in Freeport on Saturday at 9pm Central for a guild meeting. If you would like to practice
ygData.messageBody:
I'll extend the invitation on this string as well.

I will be in Freeport on Saturday at 9pm Central for a guild meeting. If you
would like to practice Languages just give me a tell and we can meet in
freeport after my meeting.

Auraelle
E'ci Server

----- Original Message -----
From: NetKnight <netknight@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 11:47 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] E'ci server want to learn languages


> From: "NetKnight" <netknight@...>
>
> I am on also on Eci server im very good in old erudian i would be happy to
> teach u I need someone to teach me Elder tierdal combine dragon tongue
>
> Athorn The Guadrian
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Golbez <golbez01@...>
> To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Sent: 11 maja 1999 23:14
> Subject: [EQ_spell_research] E'ci server want to learn languages
>
>
> > From: "Golbez" <golbez01@...>
> >
> > Hail and well met all. I'm a level 18 Necromancer of the E'ci server
> > interested in learning a bunch of languages. Mostly old erudian but
> > anything is welcome. I have a couple pages of Tasarin's Grimoire to
trade
> > but smithing has taken all my other spare money.
> >
> > Perhaps many of us could gather in the Tunnel of Ro or somewhere
everyone
> > can be and practice languages for a while.
> >
